scripts.clean-link: rm -f slides.md; rm -f media; rm -f global-top.vue;
scripts.predev-css: npm run clean-link; ln -s ../TPSI/HTML_CSS_JS/css/css.md slides.md; ln -s ../TPSI/HTML_CSS_JS/css/media/ media; ln -s ../TPSI/global-top.vue global-top.vue
scripts.build-css: npm run predev-css; rm -rf dist; npx slidev build --base /TPSI/css/; rm -rf ../TPSI/docs/css/; mv dist/ ../TPSI/docs/css/
scripts.build-local-css: npm run predev-css; rm -rf dist; npx slidev build
scripts.predev-html: npm run clean-link; ln -s ../TPSI/HTML_CSS_JS/html/html.md slides.md; ln -s ../TPSI/HTML_CSS_JS/html/media/ media; ln -s ../TPSI/global-top.vue global-top.vue
scripts.build-html: npm run predev-html; rm -rf dist; npx slidev build --base /TPSI/html/; rm -rf ../TPSI/docs/html/; mv dist/ ../TPSI/docs/html/
scripts.build-local-html: npm run predev-html; rm -rf dist; npx slidev build

scripts.build-local-tpsi4-uml: npm run predev-tpsi4-uml; rm -rf dist; npx slidev build
